ingredients: 4 cups diced seedless watermelon, 1 cup white sugar, 3 tablespoons lemon juice, 1 dash salt,   +   1/4 cup cold water, 1 (.25 ounce) envelope unflavored gelatin, 1 cup chilled heavy cream
nutrition: Total Fat 11g 14%, Saturated Fat 7g 35%, Cholesterol 41mg 14%, Sodium 63mg 3%, Total Carbohydrate 32g 12%, Dietary Fiber 0g 1%, Total Sugars 30g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 9mg 45%, Calcium 26mg 2%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 115mg 2%
